Automatically schedules meetings at the best time for everyone. You just check your calendar and hop into the next meeting.

## Pairs you with the perfect assistant
Interviews, tests, trains, and hires the best assistant for you.
[ Get Started ](https://getmagic.com/</getstarted/>)
[ Browse use cases ](https://getmagic.com/<#>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20321%20321'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Proactive, high-attention to detail, 100% fluent in English, experienced.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20321%20321'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Assistants pass 4+ weeks of live training and live tests before meeting you.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg%20xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%20viewBox='0%200%20519%20258'%3E%3C/svg%3E)

Magic provides weekly 1-on-1 coaching to upskill your assistant forever.
[ Magic AI ](https://getmagic.com/<#>)
## Your assistant works smarter with their own AI assistant. 
All Magic assistants get unlimited paid access to top LLMs and AI tools to streamline your processes.

Magic solves the problem for you.
[ Assistant Support ](https://getmagic.com/<#>)
## Ridiculously great support every step of the way
Any problem that comes your way, Magic will solve.
[ Competitor Analysis ](https://getmagic.com/<#>)
## Magic vs hiring in-person
Spend time on the important work. Magic will take care of the rest.
[ Get Started ](https://getmagic.com/</getstarted/>)
[ Browse use cases ](https://getmagic.com/<#>)
## Magic Assistant
  * **Full time assistant** Dedicated to you 40 hrs/week
  * **Hire fast: < 1 week **Hire in days, not weeks or months
  * **Half the cost** Save $30k yearly per assistant
  * **Business & personal tasks**For work, personal life, or both
  * **On your schedule** Works your schedule & time zone
  * **Handpicked by Magic Match** Curated from top 0.5% of talent
  * **Best-in-class training** On email, calendar, AI & more
  * **Easy to scale up or down** Add or replace an assistant. Cancel anytime.
  * **Co-managed by Magic** Be hands off. Magic will manage them.
  * **Share private info safely** Magic Vault safely shares info
  * **Account manager on speed dial** Dedicated point of contact to Magic
  * **Continuous training** Magic levels up your assistant over time
  * **Magic 24/7** 24/7 backup assistance any time


[ Get Started ](https://getmagic.com/</getstarted/>)
## Hiring in Person
  * Takes months to hire the right person
  * Expensive: usually 5x the cost
  * No 24/7 backup or support
  * Difficult to replace if they quit
  * Not already trained
  * Not managed
  * You handle all HR (recruiting, hiring, documentation, payroll, etc.)
  * May not handle business and personal tasks
  * Not using the latest tools and AI

## Magic Assistant
  * **Full time assistant** Dedicated to you 40 hrs/week
  * **Hire fast: < 1 week **Hire in days, not weeks or months
  * **Half the cost** Save $30k yearly per assistant
  * **Business & personal tasks**For work, personal life, or both
  * **On your schedule** Works your schedule & time zone
  * **Handpicked by Magic Match** Curated from top 0.5% of talent
  * **Best-in-class training** On email, calendar, AI & more
  * **Easy to scale up or down** Add or replace an assistant. Cancel anytime.
  * **Co-managed by Magic** Be hands off. Magic will manage them.
  * **Share private info safely** Magic Vault safely shares info
  * **Account manager on speed dial** Dedicated point of contact to Magic
  * **Continuous training** Magic levels up your assistant over time
  * **Magic 24/7** 24/7 backup assistance any time


 Get Started ‚ü®5‚ü©
## Hiring in Person
  * Takes months to hire the right person
  * Expensive: usually 5x the cost
  * No 24/7 backup or support
  * Difficult to replace if they quit
  * Not already trained
  * Not managed
  * You handle all HR (recruiting, hiring, documentation, payroll, etc.)
  * May not handle business and personal tasks
  * Not using the latest tools and AI

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Magic**

Magic, founded in 2015 and a proud member of Y Combinator's W15 batch, is all about delivering excellence in virtual assistance. Based in Washington, D.C., the company has rapidly grown to a dedicated team of 350 employees. The mission? To provide extremely talented assistants for busy people, helping individuals and businesses soar by offloading the mundane tasks that clutter their days.

### What They Offer
Magic acts as a facilitator for businesses and busy individuals by connecting them with high-quality executive assistants. Their offerings include:

- **Executive Assistants:** Focused on operational excellence to support busy professionals.
- **Magic 24/7:** A dedicated concierge-style service that never sleeps, providing urgent assistance whenever needed.

Magic holds a unique position in the market, combining technology with human touch. They handpick candidates from the top 0.5% of applicants, ensuring each assistant is not only experienced and fluent in English but also undergoes extensive training before they start working with clients. Additionally, assistants receive continuous training to continually improve their skills.

### Services Offered
Magic‚Äôs services expand across several use cases:
- Executive tasks
- General and administrative support
- Customer service functions
- Bookkeeping tasks

Every aspect is designed to improve efficiency, leaving clients free to focus on the work that truly matters.

### Competitive Edge
Unlike traditional hiring methods, which can be lengthy and expensive, Magic enables clients to hire in less than a week and at about half the average cost of a full-time assistant. They also provide 24/7 support, ensuring that there's always someone ready to assist‚Äîeven when your designated assistant is offline.

#### Client Experiences
Magic has garnered a plethora of positive reviews for its services. Clients often express how using Magic significantly alleviates their daily stress and enhances productivity. The feedback emphasizes the service as a time-saver, highlighting the seamless integration of assistant support into their daily workflow.

### Conclusion
Magic isn't just a service; it's a game-changer for those swamped with endless tasks. Their knack for pairing clients with exceptional assistants and continuous support makes them a go-to option for anyone looking to reclaim their time and increase their productivity.

For more, head over to [their website](https://getmagic.com/) and get started on making your life a little less busy‚Äîand a lot more magical.
